system.description:
Distorts your form, making you appear as a hazy, shifting blur. Attackers have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Scaling: At dice count 3, also grants advantage on Dexterity saves. At dice count 6, can affect allies. At dice count 9, you can move through enemies. At dice count 12, become nearly impossible to target. At dice count 15, phase partially out of reality.
